fulltext:
THO NGUYEN 
Senior iOS Developer | Male | 15/08/1991 
Experience                         5 years 
Latest company                 FSOFT 
Highest education            Bachelors 
Languages                        Vietnamese – Native | English Intermediate 
Email                                xuantho.dkny@gmail.com 
Phone                               0767638477 
Skype                               xuantho.dkny 
LinkedIn                          https://www.linkedin.com/in/xuantho000k/                    
Address                            Linh Xuan, Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh 
SUMMARY 
I have five years experience in working as iOS Developer. I have a strong background and understand 
object oriented programming and knowledge of design pattern such as MVC, MVVM, MVP, Singleton, 
Decorator, Observer, Facade. 
The iOS technologies I used to as Interface Builder(storyboard, xib), UIKit, CoreData, Core Animation, 
Autolayout, Core Location, Grand Central Dispatch, iOS memory management, XCTest, 
MPMoviePlayerController, AVPlayer, AVPlayLayer, AVPlayerItem and others iOS technologies.... 
I have worked with some third-party libraries such as AFNetworking, SDWebImage, MBProgressHUB, 
JSONModel, Crashlytics, Fabric.... I have experienced in integrating restful API and social networks SDK 
into application such as Facebook, Twitter, Google.... 
I am able to learn new technologies quickly and have ability to multi-task on multiple projects and 
analytical, resolve problem. I can lead and train iOS to team member. 
SKILL 
§ PHP 
§ MySQL 
§ iOS Development 
§ Android Development 
§ Android Studio 
§ Git 
§ Objective C 
§ OOP 
§ SQLite 
§ Swift 
§ Design Pattern 
§ xCode 
§ Source Tree 
§ Core Java 
§ Fabric 
§ Kotlin 
§ C# 
§ Cocoapods 
§ Visual Studio 
§ React Native 
§ Xamarin iOS 
EXPERIENCE 
FSOFT HCM 
Senior Software Engineer | 11/2017 - Present 
Working on an application like Uber and some apps for smart home. 
My responsibility: 
§ Use C# and Xamarin iOS to build app 
§ Build and maintain a new app. 
§ Training and share knowledge with team members. 
§ Upgrade iOS projects use Frame and AutoresizingMask to Autolayout. 
§ Review code. 
§ Lead a team of six member. 
§ Estimate project time. 
iOS technologies used such as Interface Builder(storyboard, xib), UIKit, Autolayout, Foundation, Photos, 
Notification Center, SystemConfiguration, … 
.Net technologies used such as HttpClient, Websocket, … 
Nuget used such as NewtonJSON, SDWebImage, Google Maps SDK, Google Places SDK, iCarousel, Lottie ... 
KEAZ VIETNAM 
iOS Developer | 3/2017 – 9/2017 
Working on an application to share the car and user can book it to use. 
My responsibility: 
§ Build and maintain a new app. 
§ Share knowledge with team members. 
§ Lead a team of two member. 
§ Estimate project time. 
iOS technologies used such as Interface Builder(storyboard, xib), UIKit, Autolayout, Foundation, Photos, 
Notification Center, SystemConfiguration, CoreData, … 
Third party libs used such as AFNetworking, JSONModel, DBCamera, Braintree, Hockeyapp... 
ISB VIETNAM 
Middle Software Engineer | 8/2015 – 9/2016 
Working on some projects about health care such as: 
§ Application to track of the medical examination. 
§ Application to manage doctor’s prescription. 
My responsibility: 
§ Discussing with customer to resolve problem. 
§ Implementing new feature and fixing bugs with the tasks on Redmine. 
§ Share knowledge with team members. 
§ Learning new technologies. 
iOS technologies used such as Interface Builder(storyboard, xib), UIKit, Autolayout, Foundation, 
QuartzCore, SystemConfiguration, CoreData, iOS SQLite, CoreLocation... 
Third party libs used such as AFNetworking, SDWebImage, JSONModel, CocoaLumberjack, ZXingObjC, 
FMDB... 
KEROFROG 
iOS Developer | 4/2014 – 11/2014 
Working on some projects such as: 
§ Application to track processing of the baneful bag. 
§ Application offering tips on food in supermarket for pregnancy. 
§ Application to custom Themes for Lock Screen Background and Wallpapers. 
§ Application manage remote staffs, projects and tasks. 
My responsibility: 
§ Building, maintaining iOS apps. 
§ Using Epiphany PHP lib to create api for ios app. 
§ Building web site with Wordpress. 
§ Leaning Objective-C, PHP, Mac OS, iOS. 
iOS technologies used such as InterfaceBuilder(storyboard), UIKit, CoreLocation, Foundation, Message UI, 
QuartzCore, SystemConfiguration, CoreData... 
Third party libs used such as AFNetworking, SDWebImage, ZBar, MagicalRecord, ECSlidingViewController... 
EDUCATION 
THE UNIVERSITY OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY – NATIONAL UNIVERSITY HO CHI 
MINH CITY 
Bachelors | Computer Science | 10/2009 – 6/2014 
Have basic knowledge of algorithm, data structure, OOP, programming language such as C/C++, C#. 
Learning about basic knowledge of the Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning. 
REFERENCE 
NGUYEN MINH CHAU 
Project Manager at FSOFT 
chau.nguyen8@yahoo.com.vn | 0919102004 
LE DANH 
Project Manager at KEAZ Vietnam 
ledanh57@gmail.com | 0907506641 
MAI PHAM MY NGOC 
Project Manager at ISB Vietnam 
mpmngoc@gmail.com | 01689625285 
NGUYEN HOANG SON 
Manager at KEROFROG 
hoangson85@gmail.com | 0909918042
